MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH63 postcode area of Bebington, affecting properties in Foxcovers Road and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:39PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 6:00PM and we expect the power to be restored by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:24PM on 23rd April 2021.
